references: We use two well-known public CTR prediction datasets Criteo CriteoLabs (2014) and Avazu CriteoLabs (2014) to validate our method, and manually partition their attributes into two parts to simulate the vertical data setting. Details of datasets and the corresponding model structure are summarized in Table 2. The two partitioned field sets in each dataset are respectively called the â€œAâ€ and the â€œBâ€ by their natural order. Itâ€™s worth noting that, their contribution to label discrimination differs, so we alternatively select one of them as the active party (accompanied with the label) to validate JPLâ€™s robustness against field importance.
